question_text: Which of the following best describes the physical characteristics of a Type A HDMI connector?
answer_options: It has 15 pins and is colored blue
It is reversible and used for USB-C
It has 19 pins in a trapezoid shape
It is round and supports coaxial signals
correct_answer: It has 19 pins in a trapezoid shape
explanation: The Type A HDMI connector has 19 pins and a distinctive trapezoid shape, helping users insert it in the correct orientation.
